title: Mixed beetroots and asparagus with goats' cheese
ingredients: 250g/9oz raw beetroot, preferably mixed varieties and colours, such as white, golden and red
handful silver sorrel leaves, or green sorrel leaves if unavailable
150-200g/5Â½-7oz goats' cheese, broken into small nuggets, preferably from Woolsery
2-3 pickled walnuts, chopped into small cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
